meanings.definition: The science of communication and control in animals and machines.
meanings.sent1: Cybernetics helps us understand how animals and machines communicate.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use cybernetics to study communication in living beings and technology.
meanings.sent3: Learning about cybernetics is like deciphering secret codes between animals and machines.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cybernetics, every signal is a message waiting to be decoded.
meanings.sent5: The intricate web of cybernetics reveals the hidden language of nature and technology.

meanings.definition: The study of systems and processes that interact with feedback loops.
meanings.sent1: Understanding cybernetics involves analyzing how systems respond to feedback loops.
meanings.sent2: Engineers apply cybernetics to improve systems by considering feedback loops.
meanings.sent3: When systems go haywire, cybernetics steps in to untangle the loop-de-loops.
meanings.sent4: Cybernetics is like a conductor orchestrating the harmony of feedback loops in systems.
meanings.sent5: The dance of cybernetics and feedback loops creates a symphony of balance in processes.

meanings.sent1: Cybernetics explores how systems can regulate themselves effectively.
meanings.sent2: The concept of cybernetics revolves around systems maintaining their own balance.
meanings.sent3: A world run by cybernetics would be like having self-driving cars for everything.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of cybernetics, systems become the masters of their own destiny.
meanings.sent5: The magic of cybernetics lies in systems that can steer themselves towards success.
